title: Frequency Analysis of List Elements
description: In this challenge, you will create a Python function that takes a list as an argument and returns a dictionary with the unique values of the list as keys and their frequencies as the values. This is a common task in data analysis and can be useful in many different applications.

meta.title: Frequency Analysis of List Elements
meta.description: Discover a Python function that analyzes the frequency of unique values in a list, a valuable tool for data analysis.
meta.keywords: frequency, python, list, unique values, data analysis

verify.name: Verify Python Script Execution in Temporary Directory
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
